name: queenly-majesty

effect.scarlet-violet: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
effect.the-teal-mask: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
effect.the-indigo-disk: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.

short_effect: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon's majesty pressures opponents and makes them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
flavor_text.the-teal-mask: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.
